p: Indicator species analysis revealed 7 bacterial genera that were strongly associated with either Ae. mcintoshi or Ae. ochraceus ( Table 3). Propionibacterium, Anoxybacillus, Chryseobacterium, and Roseomonas were significantly associated with Ae. mcintoshi while Enterobacter, Acinetobacter, and unclassified bacteria were significantly associated with Ae. ochraceus. However, only the unclassified bacteria had the cutoff indicator value â‰¥60%.
